short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using Dictionary World, you may look up a word's definition, synonyms, and antonyms in English.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension enables users to look up word definitions, synonyms, antonyms, and pronunciation.
Two methods for word lookup: typing in extension popup or double-clicking text on screen.
Instant access to word information without effort.
Customizable features tailored to user preferences.
Ability to store searched words and meanings.
Option to download word listings with meanings in CSV format for study purposes.
